programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang kehilangan Lisa, seorang penyiasat yang menjadi misteri kerana berkait rapat dengan kes-kes pembunuhan yang sedang disiasatnya bersama seorang rakannya, Azam. Seorang jurugambar amatur bernama Joni, menjadi petunjuk kepada misteri kehilangan Lisa.

programme.title: Tukul Arwana One Man Show Ep8
programme.desc: Sebuah program bual bicara yang dihoskan Tukul Arwana di Indosiar menyajikan hiburan terbaru yang akan menemani penonton semasa pandemik COVID-19 bersama bintang jemputan, tokoh masyarakat dan mereka yang tular di media sosial.

programme.title: Merajut Gorontalo Ep4
programme.desc: Separa dokumentari yang menerokai tradisi masakan Gorontalo yang pelbagai dan unik. Program ini menampilkan hidangan tradisional, cara penyediaan yang asli, dan budaya masakan tempatan di daerah Gorontalo.

programme.title: Rahasia Cinta Bawang Putih
programme.desc: Ratu dan Amara adalah adik beradik tiri yang tinggal di bawah bumbung yang sama. Amara selalu mempermainkan Ratu. Sehinggalah pada suatu hari, ada seorang lelaki kacak bernama Emir. Di sebuah majlis, Ratu mendapat perhatian ramai orang kerana dia sangat cantik, Emir meluahkan rasa cintanya kepada Ratu, Amara melihatnya dan merasa jengkel.

programme.title: D'Academy Asia 6 Ep44
programme.desc: D'Academy Asia dengan slogan "Suara Sejati Asia" adalah pertandingan menyanyi dangdut tingkat Asia. Negara berikutnya yang akan bergabung dalam DA Asia 6 adalah Trkiye! Bersiaplah menjadi bintang dangdut terbesar di Asia!

programme.title: Satu Cinta Dua Hati Ep34
programme.desc: Rumah tangga Salwa dan Fahri dikurniakan dua cahaya mata iaitu Nayla dan Arsya. Perkahwinan yang pada asalnya penuh kebahagiaan kini berakhir dengan duka apabila Fahri memutuskan untuk meninggalkan keluarganya bagi merantau ke bandar demi mengejar kejayaan. Dalam usaha menyara kedua anaknya, Salwa bekerja keras setelah ditinggalkan suaminya. Namun, keamanan keluarga kecil ini diganggu oleh peristiwa besar yang berlaku di rumah mereka.

programme.title: Qari Cilik Season 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Musim kedua program pencarian bakat untuk menghafal al-Quran bagi kanak-kanak sehingga berusia 14 tahun kini kembali. Ikuti musim ini untuk menyaksikan bakat-bakat muda yang hebat dalam dunia penghafalan al-Quran.

programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Senyummu Lebih Ampuh Dari Baso Sepuh
programme.desc: Jihan telah dicurangi oleh kekasihnya dengan sahabatnya sendiri. Malangnya, Fatih diminta untuk berpura-pura menjadi kekasih sahabat Jihan.

programme.title: Doa Ibu Penjual Mie Kangkung Yang Tulus Membimbing Anaknya Yang Lupa Daratan
programme.desc: Marwah, seorang penjual mie kangkung, harus melembutkan hati Neneng yang keras. Hal ini disebabkan oleh pengaruh budaya di ibu kota yang membuatnya tidak menghargai orang tuanya.

programme.title: Destiny of Us Ep9
programme.desc: Apabila Narin jatuh dari air terjun dan hilang, Nares pulang ke Thailand untuk mencari abangnya dan mengurus 'Nara Resort'. Di sana, dia bertemu Sine, cinta pertamanya yang kini menjadi pembantu Narin. Khabar angin mengatakan Sine adalah isteri rahsia Narin, mengecewakan Nares, tetapi mereka bekerjasama mencari Narin. Ketika Sine hampir terbunuh, mereka curiga kehilangan Narin mungkin dirancang. Bersama, mereka berusaha mengungkap kebenaran, membuka pintu kepada cinta yang tidak disengajakan.

programme.title: Decibel
programme.desc: A former navy commander receives a threatening call who claims to blow up a stadium with a sound-responsive bomb. He must face the secret he left buried in the deep sea to track this terrorist down.

programme.title: I Am The King
programme.desc: A runaway prince meets a slave who bears a strikingly similar appearance to himself. The prince gets mistaken as the slave and the slave is crowned as King.

programme.title: A Year-End Medley
programme.desc: From awkward first love to crush on a friend and long forgotten love, 14 love-struck individuals are brought together at Hotel Emross on New Years Eve.

programme.title: Cobweb
programme.desc: Director Kim has completed filming Cobweb, but he decided to re-shoot the ending. With chaos and people don't understand the new ending, will Kim be able to complete his masterpiece?

programme.title: Once In A Summer
programme.desc: A young couple in 1969 meet and fall in love in the midst of economic and political changes and get swept up and torn apart by the political tensions of the time.

programme.title: Miracle In Cell No.7
programme.desc: A mentally challenged father who's wrongly jailed for the murder of a young girl reunites with his young daughter in the prison.

programme.title: Tazza: One Eyed Jack
programme.desc: A young poker joins a poker team lead by the legendary One-Eyed Jack to pay off his debt, but a single mistake puts the entire team in a life-or-death situation.

programme.title: Pawn
programme.desc: An unusual family is born as two ruthless loan sharks take in a little girl as collateral for unpaid debts.

programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: In order to maintain peace, a ruthless detective and his ragtag team plan to take down the most feared Chinese gangster in Seoul.

programme.title: Set Me Free
programme.desc: Being abandoned in a group home since young, Young-Jae now struggles to make a living as he's too old to live there anymore.

programme.title: The Point Men
programme.desc: A diplomat and an National Intelligence Service agent headed to Afghanistan to save South Korean missionaries captured by Taliban. They only have 24 hours...

programme.title: Samjin Company English Class
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in South Korea, three female office co-workers who enroll in English classes in hopes to advance their careers, struggle to expose the corruption inside their company.

programme.title: Howling
programme.desc: A detective and his rookie partner probe a murder in which the victim appears to have unusual bite marks.

programme.title: I (2021)
programme.desc: Ah-Young who grew up in an orphanage becomes the babysitter of Young-Chae, who is raising a 6-month-old child on her own. One day, her child has an accident and she places all the blame on Ah-Young...

programme.title: Ditto
programme.desc: A voice from the future echoes through an antique radio connects the two living 20 years apart and changed Yong's life forever.

programme.title: My Little Bride
programme.desc: A high school girl was forced to marry a college student by her grandfather. The effort to keep the marriage secret was soon challenged as her husband will be teaching in her school as an intern

programme.title: Confidential Assignment
programme.desc: When a crime organization from N. Korea crosses borders and enters S. Korea, a S. Korean detective must cooperate with a N. Korean detective to investigate their whereabouts.

programme.title: The Swordsman
programme.desc: Joseons greatest swordsman went hiding after the fall of King Gwanghae. When his daughter is taken hostage by a Qing envoy, he has no choice but to raise his sword again to rescue her.

programme.title: Soar Into The Sun
programme.desc: An elite combat pilot carries a rescue mission to his missing teammate while facing threats from the north.

programme.title: Dr. Cheon And The Lost Talisman
programme.desc: Dr. Cheon is a fake exorcist who cannot see or hear any ghosts. One day, a woman comes to Dr. Cheon, asking him to save her possessed younger sister...

programme.title: War Of The Arrows
programme.desc: Set during the second Manchu invasion of Korea, Nam Yi, the best archer in Korea, goes up against the Qing Dynasty to rescue his younger sister Ja In - who was to be enslaved by the Manchurians.

programme.title: Tie Dao Feng Yun Ep1
programme.desc: The play is set against the backdrop of China's domestic and foreign troubles in 1932. In order to build a railway under Chinese control in Northeast China, the patriotic young man Cao Mofei joined hands with his aspiring companions to launch a heroic struggle against the invaders who coveted control of my country's Northeast Railway.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep125
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa (T) Ep222
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep128
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4950
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Shadows
programme.desc: Ching is a forensic psychiatrist who has the power to enter a persons subconscious mind. In her latest case, she suspects that another psychiatrist is responsible for a brutal murder-cum-suicide case involving a social worker. In the investigation process, Ching finds herself under suspicion instead, as she comes face-to-face with a past trauma

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: City Under Siege
programme.desc: When circus clown Sunny gets transformed into a super-powered mutant, he finds himself pitted against his fellow circus performers who were altered in the same accident, and who are now using their powers to wreak havoc around the city.

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: Soul Mate
programme.desc: July and An Sheng have been best friends since they were thirteen. They always believed their friendship would last forever, until they meet Su Jia Ming at the age of eighteen. The trio find themselves in a love triangle, which puts the girls friendship to the test and alters their destinies.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killers mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xings son attempts drug trafficking to save his fathers studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Famous pop idol Peng travels to Rome for a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Mang, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy. Peng and Mang have nothing in common but spend a magical night in Rome together. Their lives begin to change as the two start to fall in love.

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kits master, Debo.

programme.title: We are Family
programme.desc: Struggling as an extra, Chi Kwong joins a rent-a-family company run by Carlos and aspiring actress Catherine, and rent themselves out as make-believe relatives. As they surrogate different families, they unravel the complexities of family relationships, forging deeper connections along the way.

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: Mr McDreamy
programme.desc: A second generation rich man squanders his parents money and calls himself Mr McDreamy. When his parents finally have enough and cut him off financially, he establishes a Mr McDreamy Training Academy using various unconventional means to transform his four recruits into Mr McDreamies with hilarious results.

programme.title: The Macaque Monkey
programme.desc: The world is in chaos after the tree of life was burnt. Sun Wu Kong decides to return to the past to resurrect it, but his divine power is unstable after losing the golden hoop, and he must find his younger self to team up to find the power of time. As the six-eared Macaque Monkey also wants the power of time, they clash in a fierce battle

programme.title: Song of Spring
programme.desc: An 85-year-old mother lives with her 65-year-old daughter who is suffering from Alzheimer's disease, causing her to suffer a decline in memory, mental confusion and disorientation. Though the elderly mother has to shoulder the burden of a caregiver, she still wants to be with her daughter forever.

programme.title: Young and Dangerous: Reloaded
programme.desc: In this remake of Young and Dangerous, Chan Ho Nam and his three buddies of the Hung Hing triad gang strive to fight for their own justice, further expanding their power in the triad and becoming a new legend...

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the midnight gymnasium programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: God of Gambler's Return
programme.desc: The God of Gamblers, Gao Jin, quits gambling and live a quiet life with his wife. However, a Taiwanese crime boss wants to become the new God of Gamblers and get rid of him, so he kills Gao Jins pregnant wife to force him to the casino table. Gao Jin is indignant and vows to fight the crime boss to avenge his wifes death.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: An accomplished police officer, Mann has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, he is forced to perform when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector, who is suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: A Writer's Odyssey
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name, this is the story about a father who must kill a novelist in order to find his missing daughter. Through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world.

programme.title: Grandmaster, The
programme.desc: Directed by the acclaimed filmmaker Wong Kar Wai, this epic action feature begins in Foshan when Ip Man, the martial arts master from the south, takes up a challenge by ageing northern master Gong Yu Tian. Ip Man wins the fight, but is then defeated by Gong Yu Tians daughter Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond

programme.title: Dearest Anita
programme.desc: Based on real events, the movie follows the footsteps of the fans of Hong Kong Canto-pop diva Anita Mui. After the death of the popstar, fans from different walks of life risk arrest to track down handwritten cards, letters and other possessions from Anita Mui to preserve their idols memory.

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: My Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a Korean movie, this is the love story of school swimmer Zhou Xiao Qi and a transfer student You Yong Ci. Zhou falls in love with You at first sight in high school but You leaves suddenly one day without saying goodbye. As fate brings them back together years later, can they get the spark back in their relationship?

programme.title: Flirting Scholar from the Future
programme.desc: Tiger, Lambert and Skinny Pig are massive fans of the movie, Flirting Scholar. One day, Skinny Pig who is an obscure inventor, puts together a movie time machine and accidentally sucks all of them into the movie of Flirting Scholar. The trio head off to Wah mansion to meet the maid Autumn can they find her and can they return to the present?

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Soul Mate
programme.desc: July and An Sheng have been best friends since they were thirteen. They always believed their friendship would last forever, until they meet Su Jia Ming at the age of eighteen. The trio find themselves in a love triangle, which puts the girls friendship to the test and alters their destinies.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say yes?

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Shaolin Rescuers
programme.desc: Hong Xi Guan of Shaolin is chased and wounded by a martial arts scum who took refuge in the Qing court. He is saved and healed by friends from the wet market and they hide Hong in a bean curd shop to protect him. However, Hongs enemy finds him and ambushes him at the shop, hoping to capture Hong and all his friends.

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: Opium And The Kung-Fu Master
programme.desc: Tie Qiao San, head of the Ten Guangdong Tigers, is an honourable master with many disciples. As opium becomes popular among the nobles, Tie starts taking it and gradually harms his body. When an opium houses owner defeats Tie in a fight and he is only saved from being killed by his disciple, Tie vows to quit opium and get back on his feet.

programme.title: Diary of a Lady-killer
programme.desc: Tycoon Zhou is a playboy who is engaged to be married, but that did not keep him from working his charms on as many ladies as he can. He keeps a diary about his romantic escapades and soon, the women with whom he has been intimate with are being murdered one by one. Zhou becomes the number one suspect by the police but is the killer someone else?

programme.title: Brothers Five
programme.desc: The five Kao brothers, separated since birth, are unaware that the master of Teng Lung Manor has killed their father. All five however, vow to defeat the vicious gangsters at the manor due to their bullying ways. After reuniting and with much discipline and hard work, the Kaos are prepared to face Lung and his gang.

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: The Lovers Blades, a pair of invincible weapons, are to be delivered to the Qing Emperor. However, they accidentally fell into the hands of Xiao Zhong Hui and Yuan Guan Nan, so Imperial Chief Zhuo Tian Xiong hunts them down for the blades. As the battle begins, the secret of the blades are also revealed.

programme.title: The Master Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: The famous kung fu master Wong Fei Hung teaches martial arts in Guangdong. A vicious gangster plots to harm Wongs disciples and frames him for robbery and murder. Wong has to fight against the culprit to prove his own innocence and take revenge for his disciples.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: Swift Sword
programme.desc: A righteous swordsman, Bai Yi Pang, seeks revenge on an evil clan but is crippled after being beaten up by them. Years later, a young man encounters Bai who is hiding in a cave. Bai decides to teach this determined young man his Swift Sword skills so that he can help Bai take revenge on the evil clan.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf to win the lantern contest, while Zhao plans for revenge. When Longs wife suddenly disappears one day and he hears about the story of human lanterns, Long suspects Zhao may be involved in the incident

programme.title: The Daredevils
programme.desc: Corrupt general Wang Li assumes power by killing his superior. The son of the murdered superior befriends four street performers called The Venoms, and they help him take revenge by posing as government officials offering a peace token to the corrupt general. When Wang arrives at a warehouse, he is ambushed by the Venoms!

programme.title: Two Champions of Shaolin
programme.desc: Set in the Qing Dynasty, the Shaolin clan wants to overthrow Qing and restore the Ming Dynasty, while the Wudang clan is backed by the Qing government. The two renowned clans eventually set themselves up against each other, and a series of vicious fighting has just begun

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keepers daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Liu serves his triad society loyally and tries to live a respectable life, but over time his good intentions lead him to an all-out gang war with a startling conclusion.

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: The Thunderbolt Fist
programme.desc: A vicious Japanese judo expert wants to prove that Chinese are the sick people of Asia and sets out to sabotage and kill the best martial artists in dangerous tournaments. To save his son from this, the head of Ping Pai Boxing Institute sends him to the mountains to learn the powerful Thunderbolt Fist technique from master fighter, Red Butterfly.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: The Young Avenger
programme.desc: Liu seeks out Li to avenge his brothers death and loses an arm in the fight, vowing revenge ten years later. Li dies after asking his sister to send his daughter Bao Zhu to learn the Dragon Sword skill to avenge his death. Bao Zhu grows up to become a skilled swordswoman and meets Liu for the planned duel with her cousin Chen. Can she defeat Liu?

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows.

programme.title: New Tales of the Flying Fox
programme.desc: In a great rendition of The Silver Fox and Legend of the Fox comes this exciting adventure, where the only thing between the clan leaders and certain death is Hui Ying-hung.

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Lis new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hons pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Dong and Chu plan to get married but their families who are lifelong rivals, disapproved. They decide to fake suicide and eventually get both of their parents to settle their differences and approve the marriage. Concurrently, a record company announces that they will release Dongs songs, leading to double bliss for the couple.

programme.title: The Wandering Swordsman
programme.desc: The wandering swordsman Yu Hsieh Erh has formidable sword skills and helps the poor by robbing from thieves and distributing the wealth. He meets a group of bandits who are planning to rob a convoy escorting some valuables and is tricked into participating in the robbery. Yu soon realizes his folly and returns to take revenge on the bandits.

programme.title: Dawn will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parents consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: Angel with the Iron Fists
programme.desc: Lo Wei directs and stars as the chief detective in this gripping thriller; playing alongside Lily Ho, who excels in the role of an undercover avenger that can fight as well as she flirts! Caught between the crime bosses known as Baldhead and Black Widow, she only has four choices: punch, kick, shoot or bombard with explosives!

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: The Savage Five
programme.desc: A group of bandits flees with a stolen safe to a village where they oppress the villagers and force the blacksmith Wei to unlock the safe. Wei refuses and flees to report to officials, while heroes of the town emerge to fight the bandits.

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: This sequel to The Empress Dowager continues the tale of Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. Despite Guangxus enthronement, his ability to rule effectively is overshadowed by the ever-present power of Cixi. When his attempts to reform the Imperial system are thwarted by the Empress Dowager, Guangxu attempts to curb her power.

programme.title: Swordsman and Enchantress
programme.desc: The story happens in a martial arts world where everyone tries to obtain the "Deer Sword". Lian's wife is wounded in an ambush and his rival Xiao saves her. They escape to Xiaos home and he treats her poisonous wound. This leads Lian to suspect his wifes faithfulness and results in several blood-splattering duels with Xiao.

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: Poor student Lin is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises him because of his familys declining status. Lin visits his fiance before leaving for the Imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lins bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: The Golden Knight
programme.desc: The heroine Yu Fei Xia is accused of stealing the book of martial arts secrets. To prove her innocence, she disguises herself as a man and finds her way into the Shaolin Temple to find out the truth

programme.title: The Bride from Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it ain't pretty!

programme.title: One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: Accepted to the Golden Sword School after his father sacrificed his life to save his master, Fang Kang is resented by his fellow pupils and decides to leave. His master's daughter challenges him to a fight and cuts off his arm. Fang masters the art of sword fighting with one arm and finds himself returning to the School to save his master again.

programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Making It S2 Ep7
programme.desc: A Shed Hack Staycation - From executive producers and hosts Amy Poehler and Nick Offerman comes a lighthearted competition celebrating the creativity and craftiness in all of us. Each week, a group of Makers from all over the country will compete in two handmade projects one timed, the other themed cleverly designed by Amy and Nick to test the Makers' ability to get creative. Each challenge will bring out their skills and insights, as well as their touching personal stories and, of course, plenty of laughter and fun for everyone. Then, in the end, one talented artisan will be crowned "Master Maker."

programme.desc: Tunnel Blind - As the squad celebrates the birth of Rollins and Carisi's child, another child goes missing in broad daylight.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S25 Ep2
programme.desc: Truth Embargo - As Benson teams up with the FBI on an unsolved case, Fin and Velasco investigate a flash mob robbery that lead to a sexual assault.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S25 Ep3
programme.desc: The Punch List - The SVU helps a man come to terms with being victimized; Benson tries to support a victim's family when tragedy strikes twice.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S25 Ep4
programme.desc: Duty to Report - When Chief McGrath's daughter discloses a sexual assault, Benson must balance the intricacies of the investigation with McGrath's impulsive actions.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S25 Ep5
programme.desc: Zone Rouge - A cryptic message sends SVU on a new track to find Maddie. Benson tries to help a federal agent when the case hits too close to home. Capt. Curry tries to make amends with Fin.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S25 Ep6
programme.desc: Carousel - The SVU must track down a mysterious suspect targeting tourists staying in hostels and race to identify one woman's attacker before she opts to go home.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S25 Ep7
programme.desc: Probability of Doom - When a woman turns her husband in for possessing child pornography, the case is complicated by a sudden death. Benson tries to reconnect with a victim she saved.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Classically-Trained: Going Plum Crazy - Five classically-trained baking teams return to the kitchen to solve two more culinary crimes, including an elimination bake with a seasonal dessert of Yolanda's choosing; the team with the poorest performance is sent home after the elimination bake.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Self-Taught: Follow The Clues - The self-taught bakers have one last chance to prove themselves before merging with the classically-trained bakers; TV personality Nene Leakes joins the judges as the contestants face their toughest challenge yet.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Classically-Trained: Easy As Pie - The classically-trained bakers tackle their toughest investigation so far in the competition -- a savoury mystery dessert -- in their last bakes before merging with the remaining self-taught bakers.

programme.title: I Am David
programme.desc: A 12-year-old boy, David, escapes a Communist concentration camp with little more than a compass, a sealed letter, a loaf of bread. David is thrust into the free world for the first time in his young life as he travels across Europe.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep1
programme.desc: Pilot - Professor of behavioral science Alec Mercer is called upon to investigate the murder of a fashion influencer whose boyfriend, a decorated soldier and son of a Senator, has confessed to the crime. Mercer suspects there is more to the story than meets the eye.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep2
programme.desc: Dead Woman Walking - Alec is approached by his old friend CJ, a prominent investigative journalist, who asks for his help after she is poisoned with rare and deadly nerve agent. With time running out, Mercer pieces together scant clues.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep3
programme.desc: The Barnum Effect - After a passenger plane crashes into the Potomac, suspicions focus immediately on the pilot. Alec and the team are asked to investigate the pilots personal motivations and piece together clues in the hopes of revealing the truth.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep4
programme.desc: Zero Sum - Alec and the team take on a kidnapping case at the request of a desperate father. Their investigation is hampered by a complicated family dynamic that slowly reveals everyones hidden motivations.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep5
programme.desc: Lucky Charms - Alec and the team head to Las Vegas to help Camille, a former colleague turned expert poker player whos been lured into danger. They must take some risks to solve a gambling mystery before Camille gets hurt. Marisa makes a significant discovery.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep6
programme.desc: Point And Shoot - Alec agrees to testify as an expert witness in a wrongful death trial for a friend of Kylies. As he faces an old nemesis, he discovers competing emotions around an accidental shooting. Marisa reaches a decision about the bombing investigation.

programme.title: The Kid Detective
programme.desc: A once-celebrated kid detective, now 31, continues to solve the same trivial mysteries until a client brings him his first 'adult' case - to find out who brutally murdered her boyfriend.

programme.title: Oxenfree
programme.desc: Three estranged foster brothers rediscover the ruins of their childhood kingdom 'Oxenfree'...and face down the monster living within.

programme.title: Aeon Flux
programme.desc: In the 25th century, a virus has decimated mankind. Political conflicts, though, have taken their toll. Into this setting, acrobatic assassin Aeon Flux makes a dangerous trek to take out the government's top leader.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: Brendan Fraser and Rachel Weisz star in this nonstop action epic about the discovery of a long-lost treasure in the Egyptian desert that also unearths a 3,000-year-old legacy of terror!

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: Brendan Fraser and an all-star cast reunite in this action-packed adventure where an accursed mummy is resurrected -- along with a force even more powerful: The Scorpion King (The Rock).

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb Of The Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: The OConnells must combat their deadliest enemy yet: a resurrected Emperor and his legion of 10,000 warriors, woken from a 2,000 year-old curse and hungry for brutal world domination.

programme.title: Gattaca
programme.desc: A young man assumes a false identity as a genetically perfect space navigator until a murder investigation threatens to expose his subterfuge.

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Iron Man: Rise Of Technovore
programme.desc: When a young terrorist named Ezekiel Stane attacks Starks Industries with a lethal biotechnology that threatens to destroy the world, it is up to IRON MAN to hunt down Stane and his bio-enhanced monsters known as Technovores.

programme.title: Wolf
programme.desc: A mild-mannered book editor (Jack Nicholson) bitten by a wolf goes for the throat of all who have betrayed him. Michelle Pfeiffer co-stars.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Life is a sci-fi thriller about an International Space crew whose mission turns to one of primal fear after discovering a terrifying life form.

programme.title: The Secret Agent Part 1
programme.desc: An explosive and heart-breaking adaptation of Joseph Conrads classic novel of terrorism, espionage and betrayal.

programme.title: The Secret Agent Part 2
programme.desc: An explosive and heart-breaking adaptation of Joseph Conrads classic novel of terrorism, espionage and betrayal.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: Brendan Fraser and Rachel Weisz star in this nonstop action epic about the discovery of a long-lost treasure in the Egyptian desert that also unearths a 3,000-year-old legacy of terror!

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: Brendan Fraser and an all-star cast reunite in this action-packed adventure where an accursed mummy is resurrected -- along with a force even more powerful: The Scorpion King (The Rock).

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb Of The Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: The OConnells must combat their deadliest enemy yet: a resurrected Emperor and his legion of 10,000 warriors, woken from a 2,000 year-old curse and hungry for brutal world domination.

programme.title: Blue Streak
programme.desc: A convicted thief poses as a cop in order to retrieve a stolen diamond.

programme.title: Snow White And The Huntsman
programme.desc: The one girl threatening the Evil Queens reign has been training in the art of war with the very Huntsman dispatched to kill her. Evil now fights destiny.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Life is a sci-fi thriller about an International Space crew whose mission turns to one of primal fear after discovering a terrifying life form.

programme.title: Star Trek: Generations
programme.desc: In the tradition of the classic STAR TREK movies, we follow the next generation on its journeys through space and the unknown.

programme.title: Star Trek: First Contact
programme.desc: Captain Jean Luc-Picard and the crew of the newly commissioned Enterprise E battle the insidious Borg to restore the rightful future of Earth.

programme.title: John Carpenter's Escape From L.A.
programme.desc: Snake Plissken, futuristic outlaw of ESCAPE FROM NEW YORK fame, enters the island of Los Angeles (after THE earthquake) to retrieve a top-secret weapons device that, in the wrong hands, could destroy the world.

programme.title: Come Out Fighting
programme.desc: During WWII, the American army have raced their way through the countryside on the border of France entering Nazi Germany Hitler has deployed his secret weapon Lieutenant Frank Ross encounters the Nazi weapon and an intense aerial battle ensues

programme.title: Attack Force
programme.desc: When aliens arrive on Earth to harvest human DNA, a special agent is assigned to destroy them without letting the public know they exist.

programme.title: John Carpenter's Escape From L.A.
programme.desc: Snake Plissken, futuristic outlaw of ESCAPE FROM NEW YORK fame, enters the island of Los Angeles (after THE earthquake) to retrieve a top-secret weapons device that, in the wrong hands, could destroy the world.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return
programme.desc: A retired soldier takes on a military supercomputer that has run amok.

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary Director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: When retired CIA agent finds himself the target of a deadly assassin he reaches out to his old work friends in a bid to learn the truth while staying out of the mysterious enemy's clutches.

programme.title: Red 2
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Frank Moses and his team of hapless heroes return for another risky mission - this time tasked with finding a dangerous nuclear weapon. The team embark on a perilous journey to Europe pursued by deadly terrorists and government officials.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: With the worlds smartest, bravest, and most highly trained women all over the globe, there are now teams of Angels guided by multiple Bosleys taking on the toughest jobs everywhere.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: Britt Reid is a rich, spoiled playboy who has been happy to maintain a direction-less existence. When his father James Reid dies, Britt meets an impressive and resourceful company employee, Kato.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: Brendan Fraser and Rachel Weisz star in this nonstop action epic about the discovery of a long-lost treasure in the Egyptian desert that also unearths a 3,000-year-old legacy of terror!

programme.title: Star Trek: Insurrection
programme.desc: In this most colorful and relaxed installment of Paramount's longest running series, Captain Picard leads his multicultural starship crew in a rebellion to save a planet from the very Federation they serve so proudly.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S9 Ep2
programme.desc: Ireland - Ben ventures to the 'Emerald Isle' to visit Georg and Bettina, an elderly couple from Austria and Germany who made the Irish wilderness their home nearly 40 years ago.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S8 Ep1
programme.desc: Yorkshire Puddings - Gregg Wallace steps inside a huge Yorkshire pudding factory in Hull to learn how Aunt Bessie's produces a staggering 500 million Yorkshire puddings every year.

programme.title: Wilderness with Simon Reeve S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Congo - Simon Reeve battles his way across the Congo, braving thick jungle and tropical swamps in search of the people and the wildlife who make their home in Africa's greatest rainforest.

programme.title: Anton and Giovanni's Adventures in Sicily S1 Ep3
programme.desc: For the final part of their trip around Sicily, Anton and Giovanni make their way to Gio's hometown of Palermo, stopping along the way to meet some beer-brewing monks.

programme.title: Extreme Treks S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Xinjiang - The Taklamakan Desert - Hundreds of years ago one of the major challenges to traders along the Silk Road was the deadly Taklamakan Desert. Join Ryan has he takes a journey deep in to the remote desert, where endless waves of sand stretch far in to the horizon in every direction.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S8 Ep1

programme.title: Inside the Factory S8 Ep2
programme.desc: Jelly Beans - Gregg Wallace explores the Jelly Bean Factory in Dublin to reveal the incredible processes it employs to make ten million colourful little sweets every day.

programme.title: Wild Metropolis S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Commuters - This episode explores whether the secret to an animal's success in is to keep one foot in the wild and one in the city, becoming a wild commuter. They must overcome the unique challenges the urban world throws at them to benefit from the opportunities on offer.

programme.title: Iceland with Alexander Armstrong S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Alexander witnesses a volcanic eruption, visits the original geyser, learns about the Icelandic belief in elves, takes a trip to an unusual museum and meets an Icelandic rock band.

programme.title: How Did They Build That? S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Discover the secrets of the New York skyscraper that defies the laws of physics to stay standing; and the thousand foot elevator built on the side of a Chinese mountain.

programme.desc: Florida Keys - Robson heads to the reefs and mangroves of the beautiful Florida Keys before fishing in the alligator-infested waters of the Everglades for the Bay and Estuary Grand Slam.

programme.desc: Alexander witnesses a volcanic eruption, visits the original geyser, learns about the Icelandic belief in elves, takes a trip to an unusual museum and meets an Icelandic rock band.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S8 Ep3
programme.desc: Jeans - Gregg Wallace visits two factories in Italy and Wales to explore the fascinating secrets behind how Welsh jeans brand Hiut make their trousers. Meanwhile, Cherry Healey visits a zip factory to learn how the ubiquitous fastener is made.

programme.title: Wild Oman: Wonder of Arabia S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Sultanate of Oman is Arabia's most remarkable treasure. It is a land of surprising beauty filled with unexpected natural wonders, home to some of the rarest animals on Earth - the Arabian Leopard, Arabian Oryx, Green and Hawksbill Turtles - and many more creatures including Arabian Fox, Striped Hyena, Whale Sharks and other sea creatures. Oman's landscape is as diverse as the variety of unique creatures that it supports.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Bigness - Griff Rhys Jones starts his Canadian journey in Newfoundland where he goes looking for moose.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Smoker - Mount Nyiragongo in the Democratic Republic of Congo erupts. It engulfs the nearby city of Goma with lava, taking thirty-three lives and destroying almost four-thousand homes. Chris arrives in Goma to find everyone else evacuating. After surveying the destruction, Chris joins volcanologists on an expedition to the source of the eruption.

programme.title: Robson Green Grand Slam Fishing S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Senegal - Robson heads to Senegal to try for the Offshore Grand Slam, and finds that the country's coast provides some of the best fishing in the world.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S8 Ep4
programme.desc: Stuffed Pasta - Gregg Wallace explores the Dell Ugo factory in Hertfordshire to reveal how it makes 500 million stuffed pasta parcels annually. He's following the production of crab and crayfish raviolo, one of their best sellers.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet S1 Ep3
programme.desc: South America - The latest series from the BBC and Sir David Attenborough explores the continent of South America - the most species-rich continent on Earth.

programme.title: Portillo's Andalucia S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Cordoba and the Costa del Sol - Michael visits the ancient city of Cordoba and the Costa del Sol.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S4 Ep6
programme.desc: In New Zealand, the White Island volcano erupts - with deadly consequences. A major storm pounds the city of Perth, triggering flash flooding, hail and a near-fatal road accident when a tree is blown on top of a driver.

programme.title: Robson Green Grand Slam Fishing S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Seward - Robson travels to Seward, Alaska, where he must catch three species of fish from a set list in a single day, but first he trains in Homer where the halibut are enormous!

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Behind the Lens Ep3
programme.desc: Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the regions species. Observe as they monitor behavior, decipher data, and deliver fascinating conclusions.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Strength in Sisterhood Ep2
programme.desc: The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomads brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Punks on the Run Ep3
programme.desc: The lions of the Nomad pride rampage deep into the heart of the MK prides territory, scattering its members and coming dangerously close to the five new MK cubs. Meanwhile, the Hollywoods are recovering, and Avas survival skills are still intact.

programme.title: Macaque Island 1 - The Young Up-Start Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the lush treed cityscape where fluffy male Matnoor rules over the 30-member-strong Street Troop with an iron fist. Then meet Aarav, the old alpha who oversees the wilder Hill Troop. Which will up-and-comer Loci challenge for the crown?

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - July-August - a Time of Migration Ep4
programme.desc: Witness some of the planets most dramatic natural shifts in July, from the Arctic ice sheets that come crashing down during the summer melt to the feeding frenzy when sockeye salmon reach the end of their journey in Alaska.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - September-October - a Time of Activation Ep5
programme.desc: Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Lola the Sea Lion Pup Ep2
programme.desc: Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentinas coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Marias side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Strength in Sisterhood Ep2

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family Ep1
programme.desc: Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Center, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Social Animals Ep5
programme.desc: Cooperation comes in many forms. Some animals cooperate to be social while others put the welfare of the group above their own reproductive potential. See the many ways species have evolved to work with one another in order to survive.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - July-August - a Time of Migration Ep4
programme.desc: Witness some of the planets most dramatic natural shifts in July, from the Arctic ice sheets that come crashing down during the summer melt to the feeding frenzy when sockeye salmon reach the end of their journey in Alaska.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Battle to Save a Sea Lion Ep2
programme.desc: Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Locals call it the arribada, or arrival. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Dora the Baby Muriqui Ep3
programme.desc: Feel the enchantment of Brazils Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 - Jungle Killers Ep1
programme.desc: A jaguar stalks the riverbank. A venomous snake is on the move. A Colombian tarantula waits for night fall. Watch as these fierce predators prowl through the jungle and bite into their next great meal.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - July-August - a Time of Migration Ep4
programme.desc: Witness some of the planets most dramatic natural shifts in July, from the Arctic ice sheets that come crashing down during the summer melt to the feeding frenzy when sockeye salmon reach the end of their journey in Alaska.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - September-October - a Time of Activation Ep5
programme.desc: Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: Macaque Island 1 - The Grass is Greener Ep2
programme.desc: Go on a junk-food-fuelled urban holiday with the Street Troop, then watch the Hill Troops invasion of their turf turn sour. Monitor the Sisterhoods plot to kidnap Saras baby before newly minted alpha Loci discovers his old rival is back in town.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Locals call it the arribada, or arrival. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Dora the Baby Muriqui Ep3
programme.desc: Feel the enchantment of Brazils Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Battle to Save a Sea Lion Ep2

programme.desc: Some call them living fossils, but that's just another way to say survivors. From the shark to the horseshoe crab, these animals' early adaptations were a success, leaving them relatively unchanged for millions of years.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - One Very Lost Sea Turtle Ep3
programme.desc: Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Choices Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how Ningaloos conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - City of Riches Ep1
programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Familys lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader whos eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Thiago the Coati Kitten Ep4
programme.desc: Set a course for adventure with Thiago, a brave baby coati. Find out how this raccoon-like fellow sharpens his sniffing and foraging skills, crosses suburban roads near his lush Brazilian forest home, and avoids inanimate and four-legged dangers.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 - Jungle Love Ep2
programme.desc: Its not easy to fall in love in the jungle. Find out how these animals turn to strategic mating strategies in order to pass on their genes. Meet monkeys who like monogamy, a bird who rivals Casanova, and a spider wholl risk his life for love.

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2022
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and take a short trip back to 2022!

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep21
programme.desc: The Fly-A-Long / Unburied Treasure - When the Dews' Glitter Guide, Willow comes to check on the Dews progress, they feel like theyre failing to impress her, until Lola gets locked out of the apartment during a game of Hide-and-Seek and Dews work together to get her back inside. / When the Dew Drops discover a time capsule in the park, they set out to find the mystery owner.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep1
programme.desc: The Nest - When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, theyre invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove they're kind and helpful.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep67
programme.desc: Spin Cycle - When a segment on Xixis show changes the kingdom Julien begins scheming ways to use the influence of the show to his advantage and creates a Juliencentric propaganda machine

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep68
programme.desc: Night Creatures - King Julien cant sleep so he decides to go on a milk cleanse to help but after Todd is attacked by a horrible monster King Juliens nightmares cause the kingdom to question him as...THE NIGHT CREATURE

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep41
programme.desc: Lucky and the Flight of the Fancy - Lucky, Julian and Aunt Cora get swept away in Julians new hot air balloon and must fend for themselves in the wilderness

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep42
programme.desc: Lucky and the Jam Jam - The PALs try to figure out why Marciela is acting so weird, while Miradero is gripped by April Fools Day fever

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep10
programme.desc: Talent Show / Sad Sad Plant - Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. But when it comes time, Scallop wants to keep the song just for them, leaving Kelp to come up with anew act- and fast! / The kids all visit the magical musical plant greenhouse on Unicorn Land. They each pick a plant to take care of, and for Kelp its a sad, almost dead plant that he falls in love with.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep20
programme.desc: Hammy in the House / To Go Lunch - When Eden finds an "injured" Hammy out of his cage and helps him recuperate in her own home, she finds it harder and harder to get her "new guest" to return to his own home. / When Marcus forgets his lunch at home, Phoebe and the Dews must find a way to deliver him his lunch during his class's field trip to the park, but when they lose his lunch they must work to create a new and nutritious alternative.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep44
programme.desc: Worms Of Endearment / Dr Strangegrug Or How I Learned To Stop Worrying And Love The Spear - Lerk and Thunk hide all the valley's worms in a cave to protect them from the hunters who want to use them as bait; Grug invents the spear and pitches it to the Valley as a tool that will change cavemanity forever!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep45
programme.desc: Tunnel Of Terror / Creature From The Croods Lagoon - Eep, Thunk, Lerk, and Womp set out to make it to the end of The Tunnel of Terror within the Cave of Secrets; After being rescued by a mysterious creature at the watering hole, Thunk tries to convince the Valley that a sea thing exists and it's not just his imagination

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep28
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep29
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Abysmal Altercation of the Abominable Altitooth - Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep30
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Bout of the Beastly Barfilisk - Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep60
programme.desc: Sitting Ducks - Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep61
programme.desc: The Big Dumpling - The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corp's super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep62
programme.desc: The Great Medieval London Fire 1135 - Boss Baby and Tina reject the 5%er system that says the cuter you are, the more love you deserve. Teaming up with the Uncuddleables, the team tries to take down the system from within, forming a resistance of the eight department heads of Baby Corp in the hopes of changing the way we look at Baby Love forever.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep22
programme.desc: Rise of the Empress - On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep23
programme.desc: Bridge Over Troubled Lava - The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep24
programme.desc: House of Flying Pandas - The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep35
programme.desc: Hitting the Sky Note / Hug Fest - When Poppy discovers that Sky Toronto doesnt sing, she sets out to convince him that singing is the greatest joy in the world./Poppy shows Branch around his first Hug Fest, a Troll festival to celebrate hugs.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep36
programme.desc: Chummy Sparklestone / Giggleyum - When the Funtime Factory stops producing one of their frosting flavors, Poppy sets out to create a replacement. But is her new flavor, Giggleyum too delicious?/During a Troll mystery party, Cooper has the role of detective. But when the party is over, Detective Cooper now Chummy Sparklestone refuses to break character, and hes causing problems around the village!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep37
programme.desc: Glamping / A Flower for Poppy - Branch is excited to take the Troll children camping with him. But when Guy Diamond arrives at the camp site with glamping gear, the kids decide they prefer Guys plush method of camping to Branchs insistence on roughing it./Poppys the most amazing gift-giver in Troll Village, and the Snack Pack are determined to finally gift her something as good as her birthday. So when Poppy off-handedly mentions her favorite rare flower, her friends set out to find it for her- but who will get to gift it?

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep10
programme.desc: Oh's Party Of Slumber / Paranoid Activity - Oh throws a slumber party to take his friendship game to the next level with Tip's classmates/Kyle will do whatever it takes to keep Oh accident-free.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep10
programme.desc: Patch Games/ Mark Twain - Sherman's scout troop, the Laser Robot Tiger Troopers, earn their merit badges on the show; Mark Twain's gift for gab wins back his lucky typewriter.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep36
programme.desc: Black Site - Zarkon awakens from his coma and orders that Lotor is to be relieved of his duties, but Lotor is nowhere to be found

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep62
programme.desc: Dances With Dingoes - A laid-back, festival-loving dingo emerges from the portal and teaches the orphans to boogie, but Puss soon learns the dance instructor has secret intentions

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep36
programme.desc: Ransom Of White Shadow/Kicked Off - White Shadow is mistaken for a celebrity snail and kidnapped; Tito gets a foosball table which quickly becomes a soccer battle ground.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep71
programme.desc: Slugsy's Song - Slugsy has found something really special. Only Primrose can be persuaded to go and see it with him. Even she is surprised by what she sees!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep19
programme.desc: The Case Of Bling's Hidden Present - It's Bling's birthday and she is so excited that she keeps opening all her presents before her party. Noddy needs to make sure she doesn't open the storybook present from him and Big Ears early but he's got to find it first! Big Ears has hidden it and can't remember where he's put it! Noddy launches his investigation to find the missing present before Bling does. Using his investigating skills Noddy follows the clues all over Toyland to find the present before the impatient little Naughticorn. At her birthday party Bling is thrilled to open the present from Noddy and Big Ears. She does have a present to open at her party after all! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep72
programme.desc: Stingo's Bridge - Webby has told Pip the story of the 3 Billy Goats Gruff. Soon a troll takes up residence under the bridge in the garden and demands food payment every time the tots cross. Can Fifi get to the bottom of the mystery?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep20
programme.desc: The Case Of The Big Wall Of Bricks - Fuse has a new electronic ball. Noddy suggests that they invite everyone to play with it later. Fuse agrees but when Noddy returns with the other toys there is a big brick wall in front of the workshop. No one can get in and there's no sign of Fuse! Noddy uses all his investigating skills to follow the clues. He discovers that Fuse built the brick wall to stop his friends coming into the workshop because he was worried his new electronic ball might get broken. Noddy helps him feel comfortable with sharing his toy ball after all the other toys promise to be super careful with it. Now everyone can play together! Yay for Noddy!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep19
programme.desc: Heavy Loader - Roary takes Loada on a jaunt to the beach only to discover that sand and lorries don't mix too well!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep20
programme.desc: Testing Time For Maxi - PC Pete and Nick are up at Silver hatch giving the cars their road tests. Is Maxi really going to be as good as he says he is or will he be unpleasantly surprised?

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep19
programme.desc: Why Hare Hops - You see there was a time when Hare didn't hop. He was one of the speediest animals in Tinga Tinga but none of the other animals wanted to race with him because Hare always won and it was becoming boring. Then one day, slow but clever Tortoise decides to challenge Hare. Hare can't believe his luck, but Tortoise wins and he wins and he wins! When Hare realizes that it's not such fun being on the losing end, Tortoise finally lets Hare hop past the finishing line in first place! Well it's not good to win all the time. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep20
programme.desc: Why Mosquito Buzzes - You see there was time when Mosquito didn't buzz. Mosquito was as quiet as quiet can be and did she like to tell tales. One day Mosquito tells the Monkeys that the sun looks very low in the sky. Maybe it's sad and doesn't want to rise!' worry the Monkeys. Mosquito flits off to spread the news - The sun is never going to rise again!' soon the whole of Tinga Tinga is in complete panic The Sun is never going to rise again!' Of course, the sun does rise again and all is right again in Tinga Tinga. But the animals decide to tie a grass around Mosquito's tail. From that day on Mosquito buzzes and everyone can swot her away rather than listen to her gossipy tales. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep10
programme.desc: Longest Yardwork / The Girl Who Cried Goose - Donna plans a garden party for Rona, but the only problem is that her garden is overgrown and neglected. The team try to transform this jungle into a backyard just in time for the party. / Lula finds an angry goose on the loose, and Team Zenko need to get it out of the park before soccer camp starts.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep2
programme.desc: Dark Park Bark Lark \ The Fast and the Curious - Tag and Scooch team up to get all of Scooch's chores done in time for the Barkapellas Bark In the Park In the Dark concert. \ Tag is so excited to join the Sam Whippets Race Cadets. But when Tag and Scooch show up at the racetrack, theres lots of competition. And to complete the first challenge - a pedal car race - theyre going to have to work together.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep54
programme.desc: Not A Drill - The threat of monsters from the Netherworld portal has Puss running the townspeople through some crazy emergency drills, which no one takes seriously.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep6
programme.desc: The Constipation Situation - Boss Baby struggles to take a sick day even though a mysterious baby cry is wreaking havoc on the neighborhood baby-love

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep59
programme.desc: Birthday Blues - Missing his old life on his birthday, Boss tries to have a full-fledged grown-up celebration in Chicago, but Carol is the only one able to chauffeur and take care of him. The two battle at every stop of the birthday party tour, but when Boss's old work nemesis sets him up for an Federal Investigation Sting at an improv comedy show, Boss and Carol are forced to work together to escape the law.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep54
programme.desc: Sandbusted - When Hiccup is summoned to the Northern Markets to look into a curse that causes people to disappear, he is sucked down into a cavern of the fearsome Sandbuster

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep54
programme.desc: The Most Eggcellent Adventure - King Julien and Maurice arrive on an island full of lady lemurs; Sage and Clover pick out Clover's emotional support hawk; Mort gains intel on Koto

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep17
programme.desc: Berry Race / The Artist - The kids have a race to decide who gets to try some extremely rare berries. / When Scallop finds a beautiful and mysterious sea sculpture, she enlists the help of her friends to search the sea for the artist behind the masterpiece.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep22
programme.desc: Tooth on the Loose / That Thing You Dew - When Phoebe convinces the Tooth Fairy to visit before Marcus has actually lost his tooth, the Dew Drops do everything in their power to make sure the tooth is out before she arrives! / The Dews decide to hold a concert in the park for their animal friends, but cant find the time to practice.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep23
programme.desc: Wheres The Party? / The Noisiest Night - When Marcus loses an invitation to a birthday party and doesnt know where it will take place, the Dew Drops set out to find the location and get Marcus to the party on time. / When Harper cant sleep because of a strange noise in her room, the Dews must figure out the source.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep2
